session.objective: Debug and fix CodeQL required check not reporting on PRs without scannable files

workLog.activity: Investigated CodeQL check status on PR #975
workLog.outcome: Found CodeQL check from integration 57789 missing, only github-actions (15368) checks present

workLog.activity: Compared with PR #970 which had CodeQL analysis
workLog.outcome: Confirmed PR #970 has both app 15368 and app 57789 checks, PR #975 only has 15368
CodeQL check only created by github/codeql-action/analyze when it runs and uploads SARIF
Instructions to update ruleset via GitHub UI to use Analyze jobs instead of CodeQL check

deliverables.description: Documentation of root cause and fix steps for CodeQL required check issue

outcomes.rootCause: github/codeql-action/analyze only creates CodeQL check (integration 57789) when analysis runs; skipped analysis means no check created
